Title: One Vigilante, 22 Cell Towers, and a World of Conspiracies
Description: Inside the mind of the most prolific anti-5G arsonist in the world—and the incoherent, very online political violence of our era.

Title: Microsoft’s Xbox PC app adds Steam games and access to other stores
Description:
Microsoft is rolling out a new aggregated gaming library inside its Xbox PC app today on Windows.
The updated app will now list games from Steam, Battle.net, and other PC storefronts — making it a launcher for games you have installed on your PC.

Title: Amazon’s next Prime Day sale is happening on October 7th
Description:
Amazon has announced its fall Prime Big Deal Days event.
It starts at 12:01AM PT / 3:01AM ET on Tuesday, October 7th, and runs through Wednesday, October 8th.
Of course, we’ll bring you all the best deals on Verge-approved gadgets once they become available.

Title: The Apple Watch SE 3 is the one to buy
Description:
When I walked into Apple Park last week, there was one thing that I did not have on my bingo card: the $249 Apple Watch SE 3 stealing the show from the Apple Watch Series 11 and the Apple Watch Ultra 3.
But here we are.

Title: Samsung Galaxy S25 users finally get One UI 8 as it expands to more devices
Description:
Samsung officially launches One UI 8 for the Galaxy S25 today, following extensive beta testing.
This update promises enhanced AI features, personalized user experiences, and strengthened security.

Title: Meta 'Ray-Ban Display' glasses with gesture input spotted early in alleged promo video
Description: The company's next smart glasses, which rumors say will have a single ocular HUD, suddenly surface in a leaked video.

Title: 'A New Story': Apple Store in Tokyo Returning to Original 2003 Location
Description:
More than three years after Apple Ginza moved to a temporary location, the store is set to return to its original home in Tokyo's famous shopping district.

Title: JD Vance vows to carry on Kirk's legacy. And, the Fed meets to decide interest rates.
Description:
Vice President Vance hosted Charlie Kirk's podcast yesterday and vowed to carry on his friend's political legacy.
And, the Federal Reserve meets to decide interest rates.

Title: I left Bain to launch a startup solving a problem I faced every day. Consulting skills helped, but here's what I had to pick up on my own.
Description:
Daphne Tay left Bain to fix a daily work pain.
Consulting skills helped, but she had to learn sales and the startup playbook from scratch.

Description: Anduril, Palantir and others are using merch to engage fans and investors.

Description: With Trump threatening federal funding and students filming classrooms, it’s pressure from above and below.

Title: Roto and category league rankings for 2025-26
Description: Updated fantasy basketball rankings for roto and category leagues, including where Stephen Curry lands in the top 150.

Title: Just Duke ‘Em! The Frank Sinatra Guide to Tipping
Description:
Frank Sinatra had a word for tipping: duking.
And no one duked like Sinatra.
Tom Dreesen, his longtime opening act, said Frank would never make a show of it.
Instead, folded bills were passed in an ordinary-seeming handshake.
In fact, ol’ Blue Eyes rarely did…
